https://tmrev.io/movie/347308-A Good Death Beats a Dull Life 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pznLxWcb1FIB20R0tL1SNroOvD9.jpg The women of a prosperous provincial family hide unsuspected secrets which range from the entanglements of love to murder for mercy or for greed. The story of these eccentric women combines love, potions, black humor and death. A Good Death Beats a Dull Life
